results.title: Social phobia: a comparison of behavior therapy and atenolol.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Flood_Factor_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565009 @@@Flooding@@@ also was superior to @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on behavioral measures and composite indexes.
